titles.title: To amend the 2005 base closure round authorized by the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 to prohibit the closure or adverse realignment of any military installation used for undergraduate pilot training.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Installations and Facilities.

bill.summary: 6/12/2002--Introduced. Amends the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Act of 1990 to prohibit the closure or adverse realignment during 2005 of any military installation used for undergraduate pilot training.
